Tutorial.description: How to use the navigation panel

StateA.Content: The universe is a big place. Travelling to other places salvaging important locations and meeting new players is vital to survive.

StateB.Content: You are currently in a sector. A sector is composed of 3 coordinates to indicate where it is located in the universe. These coordinates are visible on top of the GUI near your name.

StateC.Content: A System is a big collection of sectors, 16 by 16 by 16 sectors to be exact. In the middle of each system is almost always a star located.

StateD.Content: You can look at all the objects in your vicinity by pressing $NAVIGATION_PANEL. The filter will help you organize it by disabling or enabling certain objects. Clicking on an object in the list will select it in your HUD.

StateE.Content: To make a waypoint for a specific sector, press the 'waypoint' button and enter the coordinates of the sector you want to travel to. This waypoint will now be shown as a white blinking indication on your HUD.

End.Content: This concludes the Navigation Tutorial. Thanks for reading, and thanks for playing StarMade!
